main.name: Ivan Lei
main.description: I have experience in developing full stack web applications using Ruby on Rails, React, Typescript, and Heroku
main.bio: I'm a 21 year old developer and I love to create things. I enjoy going to the gym, socializing with friends, and listening to music!
main.contactmessage: For any questions or inquiries please contact me below.

education.description: Relevant courses include: Data Structures, Object-Oriented Software Design, Algorithms, C++ Programming, and Discrete Structures.

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: Refactored a key feature for a product-line team that prevented application wide outages. Created and implemented a time stamper integration between Shortcut and Heroku through the use of the Shortcut API, streamlining communication for Product Managers and Engineers. Revamped a notification system that was previously underutilized, resulting in increased clarity and usefulness for users.

work.title: Software Engineer Intern
work.description: Developed a Design System to catalog and match components with the MaterialUI library, serving as the lead engineer for the project during my internship. Created comprehensive inventory of all components, including naming conventions and usage guidelines. Reduced development time by eliminating need to create custom components

work.title: Software Engineer Intern
work.description: Contributed directly to web application software to develop new features for a Beta V1 launch. Wrote End-to-end and Unit tests using Cypress and Jest respectively. Collaborated with senior engineers on developing new features based off of Clubhouse.io to track user stories. Followed Test Driven Development practices to decrease time spent tracking and fixing bugs.

projects.title: Covid-19 Tracker
projects.category: Accurate up-to-date statistics on the pandemic

testimonials.text: Ivan was a joy to work with on the Occupier engineering team for the duration of his summer internship. Undeterred by the plethora of new tools and technologies he was introduced to in our tech stack, he showed a passion and enthusiasm for learning and mastering them. I was impressed at how quickly he picked up complex concepts and began contributing to our codebase within his first week on the job. Over the course of the summer, Ivan helped us add more end to end test coverage to the app, and built an error page for the site which directs customers to our customer support portal. Some of Ivan's key strengths are his communication skills and his willingness to ask for help. This is something that is tough for a lot of people, especially software engineers, and Ivan really excels at this. We would be happy to host him again as an intern!
